description: This file defines a Flutter provider class 'SessionProvider' that manages user session state, including authentication status and token management, interacting with an API client for token persistence.

classes.name: SessionProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages user authentication state, including login and logout functionalities, and interacts with an API client to persist token data.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Sets the authentication state to true, stores the provided token, updates the API client with the token, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Clears the authentication state and token, updates the API client to remove the token, and notifies listeners.
